Package asciipanel

Class AsciiPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
asciipanel.AsciiPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AsciiPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
It implements a swing panel that displays an ascii art image. the image can be uploaded and edited through appropriate methods.
Author:
Lorenzo Bianchi
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getModel

      public AsciiPanelModel getModel()

      Returns:
      an instance of AsciiPanelModel

    • setModel

      public void setModel​(AsciiPanelModel model)
      Sets the model of the panel
      Parameters:
      model - the model to use

    • getHeightInCharacters

      public int getHeightInCharacters()
      It gets the height in characters of the ascii art. A standard terminal is 24 characters high
      Returns:
      the height in characters of the ascii art. A standard terminal is 24 characters high

    • getWidthInCharacters

      public int getWidthInCharacters()
      It gets the width in characters of the ascii art. A standard terminal is 80 characters wide
      Returns:
      the width in characters of the ascii art. A standard terminal is 80 characters wide

    • pixelCoordToRasterCoord

      public java.awt.Point pixelCoordToRasterCoord​(java.awt.Point px)
      Converts a position in pixel coordinates on the panel into a position in character coordinates on the raster.
      Parameters:
      px - a position in pixels
      Returns:
      coordinates of the ASCII raster cell that lies below the specified pixel

    • update

      public void update​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      It updates the panel's graphic interface
      Overrides:
      update in class javax.swing.JComponent
      Parameters:
      g - graphic context

    • paint

      public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      It draws the current raster in the panel. When no raster is present, the panel is black.
      Overrides:
      paint in class javax.swing.JComponent
      Parameters:
      g - graphic context

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Receives and handles updates from the model.
      Specified by:
      update in interface java.util.Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the observable that sent the update
      arg - should be a string specifying the property that changed
